Title: The Weight of One Man's Heart
Plot: A string of brilliantly masterminded robberies draw the attention of Reid and his team, while Drake is confronted with a spectre from his past in the form of his one-time colonel, returned to London to seek redress for the unjust treatment of the Empire's soldiers.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
